alert.note: Alert for Logan; Mason; Menard; Tazewell (Illinois) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Central Illinois (Central and East Central Illinois)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued August 01 at 4:31AM CDT until August 01 at 5:15AM CDT by NWS Central Illinois
info.description: The National Weather Service in Lincoln has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northeastern Menard County in central Illinois... Northwestern Logan County in central Illinois... Southwestern Tazewell County in central Illinois... Eastern Mason County in central Illinois... * Until 515 AM CDT. * At 430 AM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Manito, or 13 miles southeast of Canton, moving southeast at 50 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Lincoln, Mason City, Delavan, Manito, South Pekin, Green Valley, San Jose, Emden, Middletown, Easton, Hartsburg, New Holland, Forest City, Topeka and Goofy Ridge. This includes the following highways... Interstate 155 between mile markers 0 and 16. Interstate 55 between mile markers 121 and 131. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. To report severe weather, contact your nearest law enforcement agency. They will send your report to the National Weather Service office in Lincoln.
